The Ministry of Industry and Advanced Technology (MoIAT) and the Mohamed Bin Zayed University of Artificial Intelligence (MBZUAI) have collaborated to create the Leadership 4.
0 professional training programme, which has successfully graduated 100 C-suite leaders from the UAE’s industrial sector.
The programme is designed to develop knowledge and skills in the implementation of artificial intelligence (AI) in industry, in line with Make it in the Emirates initiative.

The programme aims to enhance the nation’s industrial capacity through Fourth Industrial Revolution (4IR) technologies, and encourages collaboration between industry-leading knowledge partners to help industrial companies and SMEs adopt 4IR solutions.
MoIAT also seeks to promote the adoption of 4IR solutions by supporting companies in overcoming barriers to implementation.
